channel.title: The Chris Ventura Show
channel.description: A comical look at life and various everyday topics examined by the twenty-somethingish Chris Ventura from Southern California--with the random assistance of various friends every now and then, produced in the style of FM talk radio.
channel.itunes:summary: A comical look at life and various everyday topics examined by the twenty-somethingish Chris Ventura from Southern California--with the random assistance of various friends every now and then, produced in the style of FM talk radio.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Daily life observed and everyday topics dissected.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Ventura

item.title: Show #43 - Sour Apple Pucker
item.itunes:subtitle: I'm joined by Kat, discussing (somewhat sourly and bitterly) a little bit about how I feel as I've grown older. Kat reads a poem. I discuss a story relating to why I was featured on an internet blog. We debut our big-budget series "Alley Kat Tales."
item.itunes:summary: Released 6/6/12: Taped June 2nd, 2012. I'm joined by Kat, discussing (somewhat sourly and bitterly) a little bit about how I feel as I've grown older. I shockingly reveal my age--listen carefully. Kat reads a poem she's written. I discuss a story relating to why I was featured on an internet blog. We debut our big-budget series "Alley Kat Tales." The show wraps up with some sour-note karaoke with a few close friends. Drink up and enjoy!
item.description: I'm joined by Kat, discussing (somewhat sourly and bitterly) a little bit about how I feel as I've grown older. Kat reads a poem. I discuss a story relating to why I was featured on an internet blog. We debut our big-budget series "Alley Kat Tales."
item.author: chrisventurashow@gmail.com (Chris Ventura)
item.itunes:author: Chris Ventura
item.itunes:keywords: Chris Ventura, Chris, Ventura, Chris Ventura Show, Kat, Katherine, Interview, Podcast, FM Talk, Los Angeles, hipsters, alcohol, sour apple, sour apple pucker, drunken couponer, alley kat tales, alley cat, poetry, poem, poetry corner, karaoke,

item.title: Show #42 - Kat Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Released 3/29/12: Taped March 11th, 2012. I'm joined by my friend Kat for a little springtime induced randomness. Kat will be a future regular on the Chris Ventura Show. Here, we introduce her to the audience by asking tough questions.
item.itunes:summary: Released 3/29/12: Taped March 11th, 2012. I'm joined by my friend Kat for a little springtime induced randomness. Kat will be a future regular on the Chris Ventura Show. Here, we introduce her to the audience by asking tough questions. Join us for this grueling interview! Welcome Kat to the show!

item.title: Show #41 - Travelogue
item.itunes:subtitle: Released 3/27/12: Taped March 22nd, 2012. Show-regular Oscar stops by to say hi and talk a bit about his trip to San Francisco earlier this month. I also talk a bit about my recent trips during the show's hiatus.
item.itunes:summary: Released 3/27/12: Taped March 22nd, 2012. Show-regular Oscar stops by to say hi and talk a bit about his trip to San Francisco earlier this month. I also talk a bit about my recent trips during the show's hiatus. I see his San Francisco trip story and raise him a Portland, Denver, 2 San Francisco(s), and 3 Vegas trip stories.

item.title: Show #40 - Long-lost First Anniversary Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Released 7/21/11: Taped March 8th, 2010. It's our long-lost never-before-released one-year anniversary show!
item.itunes:summary: Released 7/21/11: Taped March 8th, 2010. It's our long-lost never-before-released one-year anniversary show! A group podcast with some of the show's regulars and guests. New interviews and classic clips. I am aware that I am being very liberal with the definition of "classic."
item.description: Released 7/21/11: Taped March 8th, 2010. It's our long-lost never-before-released one-year anniversary show!

item.title: Show #39 - Chris' Birthday Personality Test
item.itunes:subtitle: The Chris Ventura Show - Chris' Birthday / Personality Test
item.itunes:summary: Released 5/25/11: Taped May 22nd, 2011. Co-host Laura surprises me with some birthday gifts--from the ordinary to the bizzare. Also, we take a personality test to see if I'm ready for dating as well as to see how compatible we are as co-hosts.
item.description: The Chris Ventura Show - Chris' Birthday / Personality Test

item.title: Show #38 - We're Back--Lots to Talk A-boot!
item.itunes:subtitle: Released 3/2/11: Taped 2/28/11. After an 11-month hiatus, I'm joined with Laura to kick off the return of the show--we're finally back!! In this show, we discuss some of the changes that have taken places, school, elevators, and late-night places to eat.
item.itunes:summary: Released 3/2/11: Taped February 28th, 2011. After an 11-month hiatus, I'm joined with Laura to kick off the return of the show--we're finally back!!Â In this show, we discuss some of the changes that have taken place for the two of us--as well as some of the changes for our friends--since January of 2010. Also, we'll be discussing a little bit about school, elevators, and places to eat. Hopscotch around with us, won't you?
item.description: Released 3/2/11: Taped 2/28/11. After an 11-month hiatus, I'm joined with Laura to kick off the return of the show--we're finally back!! In this show, we discuss some of the changes that have taken places, school, elevators, and late-night places to eat.

item.title: Show #37 - Team Leno or Team Conan--The Conclusion
item.itunes:subtitle: From 1/28/10: Laura and I get together to discuss the latest on the Jay Leno and Conan O'Brien situation, including Jay's interview with Oprah. In case you're wondering, We'll be back to a mix of everyday topics and new music on the next show--promise!

item.title: Show #36 - Team Leno or Team Conan?
item.itunes:subtitle: From 1/13/10: So are you on TEAM LENO or TEAM CONAN? Laura and I get together to catch up after not seeing eachother for a couple of months. "Catching up" lasts for about 5 minutes, after which, we proceed into an hour debate over Leno and Conan.

item.title: Show #35 - I'm Not Dead: While I Was Away...
item.itunes:subtitle: From 11/16/09: Laura joins me after my long absence to discuss why I've been away--including being crazy sick and an accident with a ceiling fan. Also, we catch up with some news stories we've missed, and a song by Shinobi Ninja closes things out.

item.title: Promo #01 - The Chris Ventura Show: I'm Not Dead
item.itunes:subtitle: NEW SHOWS: Starting Monday Night, November 16th. Just thought I'd inform everyone in a promo that I am not dead! Thanks for sticking by and continuing to download the show and share it with others while I've been away. We'll be back in a couple of days.

item.title: Show #34 - Group Podcast 6: Hey Sandy!
item.itunes:subtitle: From 10/07/09: My friend Sandy is in town from Reno and she stops by with a couple of friends--Nadine and Jamie. Because I promised Sandy the show wouldn't be about her, we reflect on fun moments we've shared...mostly involving alcohol--of course.

item.title: Show #33 - Support Your Local Artists
item.itunes:subtitle: From 10/01/09: On this show, I share some music from up-and-coming artists that I've come to know. Includes clips of interviews with some of the artists. Featured are: Natalie Gelman, Big Joe Hurt, Brisby, Mother Echo, Neon Navajo.

item.title: Show #32 - Stuff We Don't Use Anymore--Part 2
item.itunes:subtitle: From 9/17/09: Laura and I finish up an article that lists 40 obsolete technologies of our generation. How many of these things do you remember? To hear the other half of the list, check out Show #28 from late August.

item.title: Show #31 - Kanye, Kanye, Kanye
item.itunes:subtitle: From 9/15/09: Oscar joins me as we dissect Kanye West's latest moment of idiocy at the 2009 MTV VMAs. Later: Something mysterious in the sky? Plus: The high school reunion we both avoided and thoughts on how we would have planned it.

item.title: Show #30 - A Jam-Packed Show
item.itunes:subtitle: From 9/10/09: Laura joins me this time. On this show: A last-minute surprise interview with "Big Joe Hurt." Some funny clips from the Jerry Lewis Labor Day Telethon. An L.A. legend is taken off the air. From "Big Joe Hurt," award-nominated song: "War."

item.title: Show #29 - Fall Season Premiere
item.itunes:subtitle: From 9/8/09: Ryan is back for our first show of the new season. After some reflecting and catching up, I share more details on my looming high school reunion. Later, we discuss holiday-themed shows and my intense love for the library. Nerd.

item.title: Show #28 - Stuff We Don't Use Anymore--Part 1
item.itunes:subtitle: From 8/26/09: I get together with Laura to discuss a recent MSNBC article that lists 40 obsolete technologies of our generation. How many of these things do you remember? This is the final regular show of the summer season. Fall-season premier: 9/8/09.

item.title: Show #27 - High School Reunion: To Go Or Not To Go
item.itunes:subtitle: From 8/13/09: My ten year high school reunion is right around the corner. Now that I've received word that it's actually happening, I'm torn whether or not to go. Laura and I go through some of the pros and cons to attending the event.

item.title: Show #26 - (Board) Games People Play
item.itunes:subtitle: From 8/11/09: Laura and I get together to discuss many of the board games we both played as kids. Also: Apparently the state of California hates children and their lemonade stands. And: Robert Guillaume is very much alive.

item.itunes:subtitle: NEW SHOWS START 8/11/09. Released 8/8/09 and taped July 2009, this un-aired show features guests: Richard (from high-school days--haven't seen in 10+ years), Marcos (Richard's cousin), Joel, Jose (Joel's friend--a different Jose). Confused? Listen.

item.title: Music Special #1 - Natalie Gelman
item.itunes:subtitle: From 7/13/09: Singer/songwriter Natalie Gelman joins me via telephone from New York for an interview. We discuss her current and past projects, her unique Miami to New York tour, and a few other interesting tidbits about life and musical inspirations.

item.title: Show #23 - Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'
item.itunes:subtitle: Released 7/9/09: It's a two-fer as co-host Oscar AND co-host Laura join me to discuss the Michael Jackson Memorial as well as some of our earliest childhood memories of MJ--with some differences in opinion. Your mileage may vary. Taped 7/7/09.

item.title: Show #22 - Chris Explains It All
item.itunes:subtitle: From 6/23/09: After a two-week break, I get together with Laura to discuss why I haven't been around. We discuss some of the personal problems and anxieties currently in my life--unedited and raw. Good times!

item.title: Show #21 - The Alternate Show #17: Group Podcast 4
item.itunes:subtitle: Released 6/8/09: Taped on Friday, May 8th, this show was plagued with technical problems, so it was shelved and left to rot. After some heavy editing, here's the lost/alternate Show 17. Ryan, Joel, Jacob, Alex, and I discuss my birthday and getting old.

item.title: Show #8 - Another Group Podcast!
